summary: Fixed the tabindex order to ensure proper keyboard navigation. The search input now has tabIndex={1} as the primary focus, followed by the search button (tabIndex={2}), category buttons (tabIndex={3-7}), and custom category input/Other button (tabIndex={8}). This provides a logical tab order for users navigating with keyboard.
current_status: Tabindex order is now properly configured for keyboard navigation. Users can tab through the interface in a logical order: search input first, then search button, then category selectors, and finally custom category options.
